channel.title: Nature Communications
channel.description:
Nature Communications is an open access, multidisciplinary journal dedicated to publishing high-quality research in all areas of the biological, health, physical, chemical and Earth sciences. Papers published by the journal aim to represent important advances of significance to specialists within each field.

We are committed to providing an efficient service for both authors and readers. Our team of independent editors make rapid and fair publication decisions. Prompt dissemination of accepted papers to a wide readership and beyond is achieved through a programme of continuous online publication.

channel.prism:copyright: © 2025 Macmillan Publishers Limited, part of Springer Nature. All rights reserved.

item.title: Advancing 2D CMOS electronics with high-performance p-type transistors
item.content:encoded:
Nature Communications, Published online: 20 November 2025; doi:10.1038/s41467-025-66263-0

The performance of p-type transistors based on 2D semiconductors has not yet reached the level required for the realization of competitive complementary metal-oxide-semiconductor (CMOS) circuits. In this Comment, the authors discuss the recent developments, current challenges, and future outlook of 2D p-type transistors.
item.dc:title: Advancing 2D CMOS electronics with high-performance p-type transistors
item.dc:creator: Jianfeng Jiang
Xudong Zheng
Yifan Liu
Lain-Jong Li
Lin Xu
Jing Kong
Lian-Mao Peng

item.title: Achieving high strain hardening and strength in an additively manufactured titanium alloy
item.content:encoded:
Nature Communications, Published online: 20 November 2025; doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65033-2

The authors employ a 3D printing technique to induce a triple-twinned martensitic microstructure in a commercial titanium alloy, achieving both high strength and enhanced strain hardening.
item.dc:title: Achieving high strain hardening and strength in an additively manufactured titanium alloy
item.dc:creator: Huizhi Peng
Yuman Zhu
Jun Wang
Jiaming Zhu
Jianwen Liu
Kai Zhang
Peter Lynch
